quote: A single pint can save three lives, a single gesture can create a million smiles.
dont_have_account_link: Don't have an account? Sign Up
phone_auth_prompt: Enter your phone number to login or create an account
otp_prompt: We've sent a One-Time Password to your phone
pw_reset_sent_toast_desc: If an account exists for {{email}}, a password reset link has been sent.
otp_sent_toast_desc: An OTP has been sent to {{phoneNumber}}
dashboard_subtitle: Your central hub for making a difference.
find_donor_subtitle: Search for available blood donors in your area.
donor_profile_subtitle: Keep your information up-to-date to help others.
mobile_visibility_desc: Allow others to see your mobile number when they search for donors.
geolocation_desc: Your precise location helps in emergencies.
danger_zone_desc: This action is not reversible. Please be certain.
confirm_delete_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
not_authenticated_toast_desc: You must be logged in to update your profile.
profile_updated_toast_desc: Your information has been saved successfully.
update_failed_toast_desc: There was a problem saving your profile.
account_deleted_toast_desc: Your account has been successfully deleted.
delete_failed_toast_desc: There was a problem deleting your account.
ai_assistant_subtitle: Get answers to your questions or find intelligent donor matches.
ai_error_message: Sorry, I couldn't process your request. Please try again.
specific_needs_placeholder: e.g., CMV negative, recent travel history, etc.
intelligent_matcher_prompt: Enter patient details to find AI-powered donor matches.
ai_matcher_error_toast_desc: Failed to find donor matches. Please try again.
